function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation and air filtration.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread and infection among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing recommended ventilation and filtration measures, maintaining optimal humidity levels, and using appropriate air cleaning devices.","Technologies":"Outdoor air dampers, MERV-13 or higher air filters, HEPA or high-MERV air cleaners, UVGI devices, humidity control.","People":"Building occupants, particularly in high-density spaces.","Owner":"Building management, HVAC system engineers."},{"Description":"Potential leakage of exhaust air back into the air supply due to energy recovery ventilation systems.","Impact":"Contaminating the air supply and increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Bypassing energy recovery ventilation systems that have potential leaks and ensuring proper exhaust air management.","Technologies":"Monitoring systems for detecting leaks, bypass mechanisms for ventilation systems.","People":"HVAC system engineers, building maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Building management, maintenance department."}]}
